metatags.og:title: Video shows a methane-powered bus that caught fire in Italy, not an electric bus in Kenya
metatags.og:description: A video has been shared online in Kenya alongside a claim that it shows an electric bus bursting into flames in Nairobi. But the claim is false: the vehicle in the clip, powered by methane rather than electricity, caught fire in Italy, not in Kenya.
